entry.title: Touch - 3" Plastic Swords Blue - 500 / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Touch
Type: Disposables
Price: 8.99

Touch - 3" Plastic Swords Blue - 500 / Pack

Use this plastic sword food pick to add a classic, decorative touch to your sandwiches, appetizers, and samples. With its sturdy, durable construction and tip point, you can spear sliders, stuffed mushrooms, or mini meatballs for easy-to-grab individual portions. Plus, its length will allow your guests to easily hold their serving.

The pick's elegant color will accentuate your dishes and dinnerware. The blunt hilt end adds a decorative touch while the traditional design accentuates your foods. Use the pick to hold sandwiches together or garnish drinks for a professional presentation that is both functional and pleasing! Once your guest has finished their meal or drink, each pick is disposable so you can simply throw it away.

entry.title: Touch - 6" Black Plastic Muddlers 92-942 - 500 / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Touch
Type: Disposables
Price: 11.99

Touch - 6" Black Plastic Muddlers 92-942 - 500 / Pack

Plastic Muddlers are an absolute “must have” bartending tool for any bar or restaurant. Bartender’s love this extremely durable grinder tool and it’s a great addition to any bartending set. Whether you’re mashing up fresh fruit and spices for a delicious sangria, or crushing up mint leaves for a refreshing mojito or mint julep, your guests will be impressed with your high quality muddling tool and so will you! You are sure to find the perfect addition to your barware collection with the many options we offer. Choose from a variety of translucent muddlers, acrylic colorful muddlers and even ribbed and tenderizer head muddlers. Start releasing all the fresh flavors of fruits, spices, and herbs and begin infusing them into your favorite craft cocktails and have your guests coming back for more.

You can muddle and stir with the same fun disposable tool and offer your customers something eye-catching! Muddlers are an indispensable tool for making Mojito, Mint Juleps, Old Fashions and a long list of craft cocktails.

entry.title: Hy Stix - 6" knotted Bamboo Pick Skewers - 100 / Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hy Stix
Type: Disposables
Price: 6.99

Hy Stix - 6" knotted Bamboo Skewers - 100 / Pack

These eco-friendly food picks make it easy to garnish and hold together finger foods while lessening the environmental impact of your catered event! Whether you're serving mini sandwiches or spearing an olive for a martini, these food picks are useful, decorative, and a renewable alternative to regular food picks!

Eco-Friendly

This bamboo pick is an eco-friendly alternative to wood and plastic picks because it's renewable and it decomposes instead of cluttering up a landfill. You can use the pick to hold your signature sandwiches and wraps together and dispose of them later without a detrimental environmental impact!

Versatility

Using this pick makes it easy to keep track of your customers' food as you can organize dishes by using various pick designs. The pick is also useful when serving appetizers, kabobs, and satay dishes, as its size makes it easy for your guests to pick up individual portions at your banquet hall or catered event. It's also great for garnishing beverages or martinis and presents your most popular drinks with a stylish touch.

entry.title: Frangiulia - Baresana Olives - 1.7 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Frangiulia
Type: FOOD
Price: 9.99

Frangiulia - Baresana Olives - 1.7 L

Olives are one of the world's most widely enjoyed foods. Olives can be added to salads, meat and poultry dishes and, of course, pizza.

One single olive contains calcium and iron, Vitamins A&C and E. Research studies have also shown that the monounsaturated fat found in olives can help to decrease blood pressure.

Delicious, Versatile Ingredient

Olives are firm in texture, sweeter and nuttier in comparison to green olives, and a popularly used in Greek and Italian dishes. They are great for topping pizzas, subs, and salads, incorporating them into pasta dishes, or blending up as part of tangy and sweet vinaigrettes or tapenades. Olives taste great when paired with sundried tomatoes, roasted red peppers, artichokes, and feta cheese.

entry.title: Trans Alpine - Whole Cherries - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Trans Alpine
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 56.99

Trans Alpine - Whole Cherries - 4 L

Put the cherry on top of your signature desserts with these maraschino cherries.

Featuring a vibrant red color, these maraschino cherries are sure to brighten up your menu items and bring something new to the table. These cherries are to add a more natural-looking decoration to your offerings. The bulk gallon jar ensures that there's plenty for you to use to match the color scheme of your next holiday display or special event.

Delicious Flavor

These cherries boast a crisp, sweet flavor and soft texture, making them a must-have topping for your restaurant, bar, ice cream shop, or bakery.

Resealable Container

To ensure optimum freshness, these cherries are picked at the peak of ripeness and packed in a hermetically sealed gallon container.

Versatile Ingredient

With their ruby red coloring and plump, juicy flesh, cherries are an excellent ingredient in a variety of desserts and cocktails. They're famous in pineapple upside down cakes, topping off any sundae, or garnishing a cocktail. With their juice, craft Shirley Temples or other cherry juice-based beverages. Plus, the juice can act as a natural food coloring dye, giving a beautiful pink hue to cake batters, housemade ice cream, and even gourmet marshmallows.

entry.title: Unico - Stuffed Manzanilla Olives - 6 x 2 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Unico
Type: FOOD
Price: 57.99

Details

Bring a fresh taste to any salad, vegetable platter, or drink with these manzanilla stuffed olives! Perfect for adding an extra zest of savory flavor to any dish, these manzanilla stuffed olives make a welcome addition to your sandwich shop, bar, or Italian restaurant. 


Manzanilla olives are light green in color with a firm texture. Featuring a slightly bitter and smoky taste, they undergo a process known as a "Spanish cure." During this curing process, the olives are thoroughly washed for 10-12 hours, then fermented for approximately three or four months. After all that time, each olive is sure to be cultivated to perfection!

From classic martinis and Greek salads to pasta and tapas, these large stuffed manzanilla olives will be the ideal addition to any recipe. Use them to enhance your olive bar, salad bar, pasta salads, and flatbreads! A simple yet fresh product, they can often be found in martini glasses during cocktail hour. These manzanilla stuffed cocktail olives offer the perfect finishing touch to your meals and they are ready to serve.

Unico - Stuffed Manzanilla Olives - 2 L
